channel.title: Notable Artists Born Today
channel.description: RSS feed of notable writers, poets, directors, and actors born on this day in history.

item.title: John Taylor (poet)
item.description: John Taylor (24 August 1578 â€“ December 1653) was an English poet who dubbed himself "The Water Poet".

item.title: Jesse Johnson (actor)
item.description: Jesse Wayne Johnson (born December 7, 1982) is an American actor. He is the son of actors Don Johnson and Patti D'Arbanville.

item.title: Kerry James (actor)
item.description: Kerry James Horn (born August 2, 1986) is a Canadian actor and producer, known for Aliens in America (2007), and best known for his role as Caleb Odell on the CBC series Heartland.

item.title: David Thornton (actor)
item.description: David Farrington Thornton (born June 12, 1953) is an American actor. He has appeared in John Q, Home Alone 3 as Earl Unger, Law & Order, The Notebook, and The Other Woman, among other roles. He is the husband of singer, songwriter and actress Cyndi Lauper.

item.title: Peter (actor)
item.description: Peter Hermann (born August 15, 1967) is an American actor. He may be best known for his roles as Charles Brooks in Younger, Trevor Langan in Law & Order: Special Victims Unit, and Jack Boyle in Blue Bloods. Hermann is the husband of fellow Law & Order franchise actor Mariska Hargitay, series lead of Law & Order: Special Victims Unit.

item.title: Josh Dean (actor)
item.description: George Joshua Christian Dean (born December 3, 1979) is a Canadian actor and improvisor. He was born in Burnaby, British Columbia and raised in Edmonton, Alberta, where he performed in the improvised soap opera Die-Nasty and toured with improv company Rapid Fire Theatre.
